hero.title: Transform Your Resume with AI Alchemy
hero.subtitle: Turn your ordinary resume into the perfect match for your dream job using our AI-powered optimization technology.

cta.title: Start with 3 Free Uses
cta.subtitle: Try our AI-powered resume optimization with no commitment.

questions.question: How many free uses do I get?
questions.answer: New users receive 3 free uses to try our service.

questions.question: What file formats are supported?
questions.answer: Currently, we support PDF format for resume uploads.

questions.question: How long does the process take?
questions.answer: The optimization process typically takes 2-3 minutes.
